name: stalkr-api-js-client
description: A JavaScript high level wrapper around Stalkr's API

scripts.build: clear && npm run test && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:es && npm run build:umd
scripts.build:watch: clear && rm -rf cjs && cross-env BABEL_ENV=cjs babel -w src --out-dir cjs
scripts.build:es: rm -rf es && cross-env BABEL_ENV=es babel src --out-dir es
scripts.build:cjs: rm -rf cjs && cross-env BABEL_ENV=cjs babel src --out-dir cjs
scripts.build:umd: rm -rf dist && cross-env BABEL_ENV=es rollup -c & cross-env BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=production rollup -c
scripts.test:lint: npm run test:lint:eslint && npm run test:lint:flow
scripts.test: npm run test:lint && npm run test:spec:coverage

author: Stalkr Foundation <@getstalkr> (undefined)
